General.Name: Bhakti Agung Propertindo
General.Description: PT Bhakti Agung Propertindo Tbk engages in real estate development activities in Indonesia. The company was formerly known as PT Paku Bumi Sejahtera and changed its name to PT Bhakti Agung Propertindo Tbk in June 2015. PT Bhakti Agung Propertindo Tbk was founded in 2012 and is based in Tangerang, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. Raden Fatah No. 62, Tangerang, Indonesia, 15151
